pages.title: Kamen Rider Joker
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W Forever: A to Z/The Gaia Memories of Fate (2010, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:w/devices/lostdriver#lostdriver_joker)Lostdriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)
